name: lettuce walk
description:
lettuce walk is a procedurally generated puzzle game about a tortoise in love, based on koanoftheday.com.

read true love stories: 3 #zen tales for more stories of tortoises in love, and subscribe to the kōans to receive the secret to happiness.

if you enjoy the game or are puzzled by it, donate any amount below to download a pdf guidebook to its symbols, stories, steps, and secret codes. (you'll also get the source code!)

half of all the money raised will go toward the #zenstitute. the other half will be donated to the #zen tortoise fund. together, we will help tortoises all over the world.
